description: A collection of circles in a wide, thin rectangular formation; there is also a small square formation extending upwards from the top of the rectangular formation, a small semi-circular formation extending downwards from the bottom left corner, and a triangular formation extending downwards from the bottom right corner. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a dark brown triangle to the left of the center of the rectangular formation and an orangeish-brown triangle toward the top right corner of the rectangular formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
